griffon.core.artifact

Interface GriffonModel

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GriffonArtifact, GriffonMvcArtifact, MVCHandler, Observable, ResourceHandler, ThreadingHandler, Vetoable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractGriffonModel

    public interface GriffonModel
extends GriffonMvcArtifact, Vetoable
    Identifies a Model artifact.

    Models should always be Observable.

    Since:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    Andres Almiray
